title: RIOT FRAUD?
body: I bought a RP package, it took money from my phone but i didnt get the rp. contact me riot.

replies.body: If you're posting from the account that purchased RP, I wasn't able to locate anything.  It's possible that it's still processing or hasn't gone through.  Hit up our billing team through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can see what's up!  We'll respond asap!
